name: Office Tag
description:
Do you hate those boring nights working overtime in the office? Ever heard of Office Tag? It really is that simple to make a boring night in the office fun! Get together with your office buddies and play some tag in the office! 
With this fast-paced tag game you can throw the book at your buddies and make them lose in the age old game of tag!


What is Office Tag? 
-2 to 8 person fast paced online multiplayer tag.
-Use items around the office to stun each other.
-Use doors to escape the tagger! 
So get your friend together to play some tag! 

Help us improve Office Tag! 
We are looking to improve on our game to make your playing experience more fun! 
Did you find something that is a bug? Please report it here: https://forms.gle/SoGQecxH4zX5w5jbA
Would you like to leave feedback? Please fill in this form: https://forms.gle/u2curWT6w95v124i9
